## 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lterdatasampler)
library(kableExtra)
```

Create a summary table of mean and standard dev maple seedling height in cm2 by watershed and year

```{r}
hbr_summary <- hbr_maples |> 
  group_by(year, watershed) |> 
  summarize(mean_height = mean(stem_length, na.rm = TRUE),
            sd_height = sd(stem_length, na.rm = TRUE))


```

```{r}
hbr_summary |> 
  kable()


```
